main event: An F-94C jet fighter crashed while scrambling to intercept an unidentified flying object near Utica, New York, on July 2, 1954.
interesting points: The jet fighter had become unbearably hot, prompting the pilot and radar observer to bail out., The unidentified object was reported to be seen at an altitude of about 20,000 feet., Over 1,000 calls were made by residents about a silvery balloon-like object that was sighted in the Utica area., Four people were killed when the jet crashed into an auto and two buildings., The soldiers successfully ejected from the plane but did not get a clear identification of the unknown object.
